short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you keep track of large lists of petitions and speeds up signing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easier to track long lists of Change.org petitions by overlaying a list of links and tracking which ones you have already signed.  The extension activates when you load any properly formatted "petition_list.html" (this is intended so that users are able to host their own lists if they so choose).
